doc.title: Fever Dance
doc.plot: Two happy L.A. couples. A baby on the way. A cozy, stay-at-home Saturday night. A perfectly lovely evening, right? Wrong. 'Cause Cousin Jolene has unexpectedly hit town. Cousin Jolene...dear, sweet, trash-talkin' Texan Cousin Jolene, whose exes have all done her wrong, leaving the ticking of her biological clock a deafening roar. Cousin Jolene, who has set her sights on getting the one thing denied her all these years (and all these husbands)...getting it before it's too late...and getting it tonight, even if she has to resort to desperate measures.
